text: Exhibition of a Tyrannosaurus rex skull in the museum The National Museum of Brazil collections included an exhibition of fossils. The current status of the collection is unknown after the fire that destroyed the museum in September 2018. {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Image ! width=180px | Name ! Age ! Period ! Origin !
